subject: Help Please
msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to get the Test Infected example on the JUnit web-site to work and I can t!  I get as far as having written all the code in stage 1 and then
messageBody:
Hi,

I am trying to get the Test Infected example on the JUnit web-site to work
and I can't! I get as far as having written all the code in stage 1 and
then when I go to run my first test I can't because I can't compile
anything? It says to enter the class name in the swing interface but I
cannot create the MoneyTest.class file because it won't compile for me even
though I have the import statement right and the jar in the classpath...!!

Can anybody please help as the document tells you nothing it just says,
"type the name of the test class in the window and press run" but it does
not say how to create the class first!!

Thanks in advance,
Andoni.
